ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: You were told not to act so gay, butch, queer, etc.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: You were told that your sexual orientation is just a phase.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: Someone said, you know how gay people are.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: Someone said, I don't mind LGBTQ+ people, they just shouldn't be so public.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: A family member expressed disappointment about you being gay, lesbian, or bisexual.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: Someone said homosexuality or bisexuality is a sin or immoral.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: A straight person didn't believe that gay, lesbian, and bisexual people face discrimination.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday

ElementDescription: Please indicate how many times you've experienced the following in the past 6 months: You were told you were overreacting when you talked about a negative experience you had because of your sexual orientation.
Notes: 0 = Not at all; 1 = Few times; 2 = Every month; 3 = Every week; 4 = Everyday
